message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
That's a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is there any room for negotiation?
I understand that $8000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $18000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $18000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand that $10000 is still a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $14000. This is my final compromise, but I think it's a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $14000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think that we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $16000. This is my last offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $16000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you can meet me at this price.
